sentences.simplifiedText: 他各个方面都做得很好。
sentences.traditionalText: 他各個方面都做得很好。
sentences.pinyin: tā gè gè fāng miàn dōu zuò de hěn hǎo.
sentences.translation: He does well in every aspect.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我各个阶段都会给你发送进度报告。
sentences.traditionalText: 我各個階段都會給你發送進度報告。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ gè gè jiē duàn dōu huì gěi nǐ fā sòng jìn dù bào gào.
sentences.translation: I will send you progress reports at every stage.
They each left one by one.

sentences.simplifiedText: 各个城市的人们都有不同的习惯。
sentences.traditionalText: 各個城市的人們都有不同的習慣。
sentences.pinyin: Gègè chéngshì de rénmen dū yǒu bùtóng de xíguàn.
sentences.translation: People from different cities each have their own habits.
